text:
After opening tutorial_en.html with Word, the temp folder ~$torial appears on
the server with index_en.xml and index_en.xml.meta inside.
creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com

text: Note: This is using Word 2003 with Netdrive as the WebDAV client.
creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com

text: Why would that be a bug? Do the files disappear once Word has closed the file?
